meanings.sent1: The cake was biparted into equal halves.
meanings.sent2: The biparted road led to two different towns.
meanings.sent3: The biparted sandwich looked like two separate meals!
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt biparted, torn between two conflicting emotions.
meanings.sent5: The biparted key opened two different doors.

meanings.sent1: The biparted book had two distinct sections.
meanings.sent2: The biparted river flowed in two different directions.
meanings.sent3: The biparted puzzle pieces refused to fit together!
meanings.sent4: His mind felt biparted, unable to focus on one thing at a time.
meanings.sent5: The biparted tree trunk split perfectly down the middle.
